name: Awesome kick-ass rbonvall github user page
body:
### Welcome, you are visitor number 142857
Hi, I'm @rbonvall. Take a look to my awesome code:

```
from functools import reduce
from operator import mul
def factorial(n):
    return reduce(mul, range(1, n + 1), 1)
```
